help-file.title: "GLOBE OF DARKNESS"
help-file.content:
Area of effect: Room Aggressive: No Cumulative: No Duration: Dependent on proficiency of caster Type of spell: Generic
"Globe of Darkness" creates a globe to appear over the casters' head which emanates total darkness around the room. The dark globe travels with the caster until its duration expires or it is cancelled by "mage flame".
